---
category: news
title: "Tech’s climate impact is scarier than any super-AI ‘terminator’"
excerpt: "Soaring daily temperatures, wildfires in Canada, inexplicably hot ocean currents—our worries around climate change have intensified. There is another fear out there this year, though mixed with frenzied excitement: the worry of whether we have created a Frankenstein’s monster in the quest for artificial intelligence (AI)."
